Change User Email using Firebase Auth REST API

Source: R/changeEmail.R
change_email.Rd

This function changes the email address of a user using the Firebase Auth REST API.

Usage

change_email(idToken, newEmail, returnSecureToken = FALSE)

Arguments

idToken

A string representing the Firebase ID token of the user.

newEmail

A string representing the new email address.

returnSecureToken

Optional boolean. If TRUE, returns a new ID and refresh token.

Value

A list containing the updated user data and new tokens if requested.

Common Error Codes

  • INVALID_ID_TOKEN: The provided ID token is invalid.

  • EMAIL_EXISTS: The email address is already in use by another account.

  • INVALID_EMAIL: The email address is not valid.

  • CREDENTIAL_TOO_OLD_LOGIN_AGAIN: The user needs to sign in again before changing email.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
id_token <- "user-id-token"
new_email <- "newemail@example.com"
result <- change_email(id_token, new_email)
} # }
